metadata.synopsis: Mizora final comment that she saved Ravengard and that she will bring him to the submersible.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Mizora appears and saves Ravengard if he dies in the Iron Throne and Wyll kept his pact.This plays when players see Mizora and Ravengard safe in the Submersible, she then poofs away.

1.speaker: Mizora
1.text: Let it be known: a devil always pays her debts.

0.speaker: Mizora
